author: robbiepc30
body:
I think this might be a bug of some sort.  I downloaded the PowerShell that just came out for OS X  v6.0.0-alpha.9   and updated the Visual studio code version to the latest 0.7.0.  When I try to run simple script I get the following Error "Debug adapter process has terminated unexpectedly" if I press F5 or if I select a line and press F8 I get command I get error " 'PowerShell.RunSelection' not found"

under vscode/extensions/ms-vscode.PowerShell-0.7.0/logs the "DebugAdapterClient.log" is blank.  the
PowerShell.log can be seen here https://gist.github.com/robbiepc30/38e6afca1f4ff6a63fa475a783473892

comments.author: robbiepc30
comments.body: I meant to post this under vscode-powershell....

title: Debug adapter process has terminated unexpectedly for OS X
